articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: British ministers cut off funding to chip factory after sale to China -Telegraph - Reuters UK
articles.description: British ministers have cut off taxpayer-funded payments to Britain's biggest microchip factory after its sale to a Chinese-owned technology company, the Telegraph reported late on Tuesday.

articles.title: Policybazaar parent firm PB Fintech aims to raise Rs 6,500 crore via IPO - Moneycontrol.com
articles.description: The regulatory filing also showed that PB Fintech, the holding entity of Policybazaar, has been converted into a public limited company.

articles.title: WeBuyCars buys Ticketpro Dome - BusinessTech
articles.description: WeBuyCars has confirmed that it has purchased the Ticketpro Dome from the Sanlam Pension Fund, and plans to use the venue as a second-hand vehicle showroom.
